data_table.description: The data table contains Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia Phase 2 (ALLP2) subject phenotypes including sociodemography (n=3 variables; gender, race and ethnicity), observations at diagnosis (n=4 variables; age, cns status, testicular involvement and wbc), minimal residual disease (n=2 variables), relapse status (n=2 variables), vital status (n=2 variables), and status of chromosomal aberrations and fusion oncogene proteins (n=4 variables; trisomies, MLL, E2A-PBX1, BCR-ABL). Please note that several variables do not have any data, but are placeholders for data that is forthcoming.

variable.name: RACE
variable.value: Other Asian, incl Asian NOS and Oriental NOS

variable.name: ETHNICITY
variable.value: Spanish NOS, Hispanic NOS, Latino NOS (based on more than just surname
Spanish surname only-no contrary evidence that the pt is not Hispanic

variable.name: AGE_AT_DIAGNOSIS
variable.description: Age at diagnosis, rounded to the nearest year

variable.name: WBC_AT_DIAGNOSIS
variable.description: White Blood Cell Range at diagnosis

variable.name: CNS_STATUS_AT_DIAGNOSIS
variable.value: <5 CSF WBC/ul with blasts on cytospin
>5 CSF WBC/ul with blasts on cytospin and/or eye involvement, cranial nerve involvement, parenchymal brain involvement

variable.name: MRD_DAY8
variable.description: Minimum residual disease status, in blood, day 8, 0.01% sensitivity

variable.name: MRD_DAY29
variable.description: Minimum residual disease status, in blood, day 29, 0.01% sensitivity

variable.name: YEARS_TO_EVENT
variable.description: Time to first event (or censoring), rounded to nearest 0.25 years

variable.name: YEARS_TO_DEATH
variable.description: Time to death, rounded to nearest 0.25 years
